name: afastidioushat
text:
Who hasn't?

Oh... you know.

name: untilyouaresonude
text: A comment left by untilyouaresonude was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by Overmedicated, kylank, peterjoel)

name: untilyouaresonude
text:
"Scruffy's gonna die how he lived..."

(licks finger, turns page)

name: hellaedgar
text: "I need a new haircut. This one's lost its pizazz."

name: spinynorman
text:
I never told anyone! Even Scruffy!

*Scruffy glares, then sulks away*

name: i_love_kate
text: "'Course, it's shank or be shanked."

name: quantumcasaba
text: "..you can make sangria in the terlit.."

name: i_love_kate
text: See, I would have gone for the entire quote, there but I've never been entirely sure what he says that you can make in the terlet. So thank you.

name: anticitizen
text: you all get chubbies and now i'm going to watch futurama.

name: puguglypress
text: Are you saying that YOU have?

name: afrothunder
text: I do it every time I play a solo on the Devil's Clarinet.

name: doctorother
text: This was not Todd's day.

name: cryptfiend85
text: Todd gets the trickiest riddle because he's horrible

name: huber
text:
TODD - We need a Todd t-shirt

this strip is also ace

name: serf
text: his "the miracle" shirt would be fucking incredible

name: catachresis
text: Note: Ray is staring at his own genitals as he passes out of Hell.

name: stevesperd
text: A comment left by stevesperd was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by trollcollins, madnes, symbolsoup, riotdejaneiro, tttt, wittyname, scrumpton, HeyMan, rascaldom, jollysaintpete, Conn, milkpants, Judy, atticusonline, Cracklewater, Art-Vader, Vee, CanusDivinus, Wulvaine, weemer, dropkickpikachu, Zoe, AmonRunsAmok, stormagnet, Dainbramage, Footbullet)

name: epicurus
text: I thought so as well. But as the alt-text tells you, you are in second place, because you have not passed the person in first. If you pass the person who is in a given position, then at that moment you are in the position they were in before you passed them.

name: aaron_haynes
text: I, too, didn't realize this for a while, until the most recent time I read through the archives, actually.

name: trollcollins
text: "If you are running in a race and you pass the person in second place, what place are you in?" is a good riddle to ask drunk friends. They almost always give Todd's answer.

name: killerlimpet
text: Also the Monty Hall Problem. Except that always winds up with my nose bleeding. Never mind.

name: rowboat
text: If I had to answer that riddle quickly, I would still be in hell.

name: heyman
text: complete with exclaiming "How frikken easy is THAT?"

name: hyetal
text: My first time through the archives, I didn't realize I was wrong until this strip.  Aaaaargh.  Usually I'm so good at these things!

name: evolume
text: also, todd is a squirrel, and unless he is in a multi-species race, he is just a squirrel passing humans  and getting NO CREDIT FOR IS ACCOMPLISHMENTS BECAUSE HE IS A DIRTY DRUNK SQUIRREL.

name: dracer2
text: Have you ever tried to catch a squirrel? They're frikkin' fast.

name: featurelessvoid
text: No way, you're in first place.  You were in first place already, and then you lapped the person in second place, and now you're still in first place but in an even more awesome way.

name: dropkickpikachu
text: I like your style.

name: belgand
text: I prefer the cut of his jib.

name: anzio
text: Chubby for Venture Bros. quote.

name: belgand
text: I appreciate the chubby, but it is in no way a quote of that most magnificent of televisual programmes. It's quite a bit older than that.

name: anzio
text: What is that from then?

name: belgand
text: It's just an expression. It comes from naval tradition back in the era of sail and is well over a hundred years old.

name: anzio
text: Ah, well very good then.

name: soticoto
text: I thought it was a reference to Animal Crossing...

name: anzio
text: We have all been deceived.

name: soticoto
text: I do hope in the Venture Brothers at least, that it was used in a maritime context.

name: belgand
text: Surprisingly, no. It was stated by Mr. Doe in reference to Brock in "The Lepidopterists".

name: anzio
text: Oh what the balls? I made that comment and assetbar failed to post it, 'cept in mine I couldn't remember that lepidopterists names, but I could remember the term by which they were entitle. Delightful.

name: djwhiterabbit
text: i'm afraid that you will be staying in hell.

name: peterjoel
text: I pretty much consider stevesperd, epicurus and aaron_haynes to be intellectually equivalent to a coked up squirrel at this point

name: deusoma
text: Nicely done. The Car of Pain just became a Carpool.

name: solobuttons
text: hoooly shit

name: red_dawn
text: Am I the only one who feels Ray's riddle is harder then Todd's?

name: gormster
text: yeah - what the hell? How the fuck are you supposed to know how much most rocks weigh?

name: hyetal
text:
It's not a specific question like that. I mean, asking what's two plus two isn't a riddle. The point is that rocks are not important to Ray. Who cares how much they weigh? They're all probably around a pound. Whatever, they're just rocks.

The answer wasn't a number, it was an attitude. Ray got it right because the correct answer was NOT to think about it, calculate averages, et cetera. The answer was to not care because, hey, they're just rocks.

name: epicurus
text:
Ray's is WAY harder, I think; first of all, you don't want the average, you want the most common value - and then, what counts as a rock? Do asteroids, mountains, etc. count? Rocks on all planets in the universe? Do grains of sand count?

But of course Ray would never think like that and, as usual, simply stumbles (with great self-assurance) onto what is apparently the correct answer.

name: dovey
text: Exactly. Typical Ray, stumbling ass-backwards into good luck.

name: belgand
text: Well, that and most things tend to weigh about a pound.

name: centipede_damascus
text: Todd has been in both Heaven and Hell. Hell is considerably harder to get out of.

name: closefriend
text: You can tell Todd's confused because his eye is the @-symbol.

name: tttt
text: he's crossing his eyes

name: afkpuz
text: I am actually of the opinion that Ray's question was the most difficult.

name: mr_lostman28
text: Apparently hell has a pretty lenient grading curve. I mean everyone who goes in this restroom is probably drunk... so saying something like "roughly 14 ounces" is not an expected answer. "About a pound" or "We talking little pebbles or like boulders here man?" are both aceptable answers.

name: mr_lostman28
text:
I was about to get all uppity at whoever lamed me here. But when I went to check who it was, it reads
"this comment was marked lame by Jesus "
... holy crap!

name: nessotron
text: Wait ... isn't it a stone?

name: spinynorman
text: This side of the Atlantic is going to totally miss that one.

name: erinye
text: We are pretty dumb!

name: epicurus
text: I had sex with my sister!

name: tekende
text:
Me too!

Oh, and tell your sister I lost her number but I'll e-mail her soon, okay?

name: epicurus
text: Joke's on you, that was me in a wig!

name: tekende
text: Oh, spatchcock.

name: charchar
text: Your swear made milk come out my nose.  Also, whatever happened to that hot little number in the wig?  She was nice.

name: cagliostro
text: This is my favourite exchange of Assetbar repartee so far: crisp, neat, and hilarious. Greater things may await me ahead, I do not know. For the time being, however, chubbies for all!

name: dropkickpikachu
text: What is it about you English types that just leads your speech straight into just wonderful puns without even trying?

name: spinynorman
text:
It's the crumpets, jam, and trousers.

Man, we need to adopt the word "trousers." It's hilarious.

name: heccibiggs
text:
Fuckoff, "pants" is the most ridiculous word ever. Pants? How can you EVER say it with a straight face?

(Oh by the way, no malice is meant with this.)

name: spinynorman
text:
I can say pants pretty easy with a straight face. Though in some scenarios it CAN be funny, depending on the enthusiasm with which it's said.

Anyways, here's the point in time when I unabashedly pimp my avatar and link you to this sketch in which the use of the word trousers will floor you.

http://youtube.com/watch?v=hHQ2756cyD8

name: mercuri0us
text: "AWWW yeah! Who wants to go to high school...IN MY PANTS!"

name: relaxing
text: PANTALONES!

name: lawbot
text: Try saying it in a fake American redneck accent. Hours of fun.

name: relaxing
text: pieyance

name: spicyponyhead
text:
The definitive answer that YES, "pants" is the most ridiculous word ever. Bonus: geeky MIDI device, geeky internet superstar. http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=eZZxuiaG23Y
(pants!)

name: stormagnet
text: Well Played! Clearly, Hell will need a much harder riddle for you sir.

name: smacko
text: t-t--t-tt-todd is the best. I am a make a wish child and my last wish is for Todd to do cocaine at me

name: dasilodavi
text: I believe the question asked is indicative of how you live your life and how worthy you are of coming back.  Roast Beef can return to life if he is honest with himself (also, this is probably a mild ribbing for him offing himself).  Ray is a good man, he is given a personal free pass.  Todd, well, he's going to have to hang in hell for a bit, until he wises up.

name: cousinted
text:
Why can't we have eternal life?
And never die?
And never die?


Thank you, I'll be here all week

name: nagsworth
text: A comment left by nagsworth was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by ButterMoths, slickshoes3234, Semiquaver)

name: epicurus
text:
I'm pretty suire that actually that isn't the sort of thing that's "hip" around here.

And the last word in Beef's is "Bob Sagett".

name: puguglypress
text: No man should have to discuss his own Bob Sagett with strangers.

name: beansdooma
text: is todd's eye an @ ?

name: sheriff_mittens
text: That $5.99 Burger Basket just keeps looking more and more appealing.

name: tbtabby
text: Swirly-eyed Todd looks like the Mausland Entertainment logo.

name: rykan
text: I love how Ray's thong is still around his ankles.

name: drskradley
text: Todd is still in Hell.  I forget how he gets out.  As of the time of this posting, however, his head is a sploded, so his fate is showing itself to consistently be a bit fluid.
